Contact.pageDescription: Contact Shenzhen Lianjin Optoelectronics for professional LED display solutions and technical support.
Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.description: Our professional team is ready to provide you with LED display solutions and technical support.
Contact.headquartersAddress: 1053 Baoyuan Road, Gushu Community, Xixiang Street, Bao'an District, Shenzhen
Contact.salesAddress: 1002 Huaqiangbei Road, SEG Plaza, Futian District, Shenzhen
Contact.faq1Answer: You can contact us through online form, phone or email. Our sales team will provide detailed quotes within 24 hours.
Contact.faq2Answer: Yes, we provide 24/7 technical support services, including installation guidance, troubleshooting and maintenance advice.
Contact.faq3Answer: Our LED display products come with 2-3 years warranty, specific warranty period depends on the product model.

Support.pageDescription: Get LED display technical documentation, installation guides, maintenance manuals and professional support resources.
Support.title: Technical Support
Support.description: Get comprehensive technical documentation, video tutorials and professional support to ensure your LED display project success.
Support.ctaDescription: Our technical support team is ready to provide professional technical guidance and solutions.

installation.description: LED display installation and configuration documentation

software.title: Software Tools
software.description: Control software and configuration tools download

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.description: Daily maintenance and care guidance documentation

warranty.item1: LED modules and driver boards 2-year warranty
warranty.item2: Control system and power supply 3-year warranty
warranty.item3: Free technical support and remote diagnosis
warranty.term1: Free repair or replacement of faulty parts during warranty period
warranty.term2: Provide original parts and professional technical services
warranty.term3: Warranty does not cover human damage and natural disasters

Inquiry.testimonialQuote: Lianjin Optoelectronics' professional service and high-quality products made our project a huge success. From solution design to installation and commissioning, every step demonstrated their professional standards.

About.pageDescription: Learn about Shenzhen Lianjin Optoelectronics' development history, team strength and corporate culture
About.title: About Lianjin Optoelectronics
About.description: Shenzhen Lianjin Optoelectronics Co., Ltd. was established in 2008 as a high-tech enterprise specializing in LED display R&D, production, sales and service.
About.statsDescription: Numbers demonstrate our professional strength and service quality
About.historyDescription: Since our establishment, we have continuously innovated and developed to become a leading enterprise in the LED display industry
About.milestone2008Description: Shenzhen Lianjin Optoelectronics Co., Ltd. was officially established and began LED display business
About.milestone2012Description: Successfully developed small-pitch LED display technology, significantly improving product quality
About.milestone2016Description: Products began to be exported overseas, establishing international sales network
About.milestone2020Description: Introduced smart manufacturing equipment to improve production efficiency and product quality
About.milestone2023Description: Launched new generation transparent and flexible screen products, leading the industry in technology
About.teamDescription: We have an experienced and professional management team
About.ceoDescription: 20 years of experience in LED display industry, leading the company's rapid development
About.ctoDescription: Senior technical expert, responsible for product R&D and technological innovation
About.salesDescription: International trade expert, responsible for overseas market development
About.certificationsDescription: We have passed multiple international certifications to ensure product quality and safety
About.missionDescription: To provide high-quality LED display solutions for global customers and create better visual experiences
About.visionDescription: To become a globally leading LED display technology innovation enterprise and lead industry development
About.workDescription: Contact our professional team to start your LED display project
